info.title: Face Detection and Facial Features
info.description:
A better Face detection service! 

Provides coordinates for all faces detected and associated facial features such as eyes, nose, mouth, skin tone, and hair color.  This API also returns several biometric features still in development to include gender, race, and age estimation.

post.description: Use this API to detect face(s)  in images. NOTE: API accepts JSON and XML encoded posts.
